sentences.sContent: It is ludicrous to suggest that I was driving under the influence of alcohol.
sentences.sCn: 说我酒后驾车，这真是太荒唐了。

sentences.sContent: The court granted him the ludicrous sum of £100 in damages.
sentences.sCn: 法院裁定他获得区区100英镑损害赔偿。

remMethod.val: lud (玩) + icrous → 大人闹着玩 → 可笑的

trans.tranCn: 可笑的； 滑稽的； 愚蠢的
